song.title: To You, o Lord
song.lyrics:
[C] To You, o Lord, we sing with all our hearts, In You the victory is won. We fix our eyes on You, we contemplate your cross, You are the Lamb, Godâ€™s only Son.
[V1] You clear a path when all is dark, Our hope is born again in You. We have no fear, we follow where You lead, You are our peace and You are true.
[V2] In all our struggles and our woes, For us your victory is won. Even in danger, Father, we believe, Through Jesus Christ, your only Son.
[V3] Deep in the secret of our hearts, Make of your truth our one desire. Teach us, o Lord, the wisdom of your ways, And with your love set us on fire!
